title: Raised venison and pigeon pie
description: Hot water crust pastry sounds tricky but it's actually easy once you have the knack. The key is to work quickly and shape the dough when it is just warm so the dough stays pliable but holds its shape.
ingredients: 100g/3½oz smoked streaky bacon, cut into cubes
salt and freshly ground black pepper
1 free-range egg, beaten for egg wash
